ygData.subject: Re: Smithing Info Request
ygData.msgSnippet: Most people don t realize this.  I have had people ask me to sharpen all sorts of things.  Once I had a person ask me to sharpen his axe.  I took it and put in
ygData.messageBody:
Most people don't realize this. I have had people ask me to sharpen all
sorts of things. Once I had a person ask me to sharpen his axe. I took it
and put in in the forge. Then I inpected it to see exactly what it was.
Luckely I found out that it was a Mino Axe before I tried to shapen it.
This was back before the change and it would have been lost in a flash.

Mark

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
